attributes.action: write to the Chilcot inquiry requesting to be called before that inquiry at its earliest convienience.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the prime minister should do all in his power to appear before the Chilcot inquiry at its and not his convenience. All of the main participants in the political decisions that led to war will give evidence before the election. The PM should tell the inquiry and the people of his involvement in the build up to the Iraq war before we vote in the GE.

rejection.details: It is up to the independent inquiry committee to decide who it calls to give evidence and when that evidence should be given.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
